#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i;
	char a[100];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	t=t+1;
	while(t--)
	{
		gets(a);
		n=strlen(a);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if((a[i]>='a'&&a[i]<='m')||(a[i]>='A'&&a[i]<='M'))
			printf("%c",a[i]+'n'-'a');
			else
			if((a[i]>='n'&&a[i]<='z')||(a[i]>='N'&&a[i]<='Z'))
			printf("%c",a[i]+'a'-'n');
			else
			if(a[i]>='0'&&a[i]<='4')
			printf("%c",a[i]+5);
			else
			if(a[i]>='5'&&a[i]<='9')
			printf("%c",a[i]-5);
			else
			printf(" ");
		}
		printf("\n");
	    
	}
}
